item.title: Add Trees(A CS61A Lab Problem)
item.description: If you want to learn this course, please click here. This problem is lab05 Q9 of the above course. Here is the problem description: Define the function add_trees, which takes in two trees and returns a new tree where each corresponding node from the first tree is added with the node from the second tree. If a node at any particular position is present in one tree but not the other, it should be present in the new tree as well.

item.title: Partition trees
item.description: 在学习CS61A的时候遇到了如下问题： 给定正整数n，用最大不超过m的部分来划分n，一共有多少种方法？ 举个例子令n = 2, m = 2，则一共有两种方法
